SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, hit, regdate, comm, done FROM A_qna
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM A_qna
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, comm, done, content, hit, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM A_qna) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO A_qna (num, writer, title, comm, done, content, hit, regdate) VALUES(A_qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{comm}, #{done}, #{content}, #{hit}, SYSDATE)
